import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import Product from '../../components/Product/Product' import axios from 'axios' const HomeScreen = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchProducts = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get("/api/products"); setProducts(data) } fetchProducts() }, []); return ( <>







{products.map(product => ( ))} ) } export default HomeScreen
